job_tasks.phrase: Creating and maintaining assets and components with java, Mendix and other technologies
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and upkeep of software components using specific technologies, which is a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: leverage usage and/or integrate with external (cloud) platforms.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of software with external systems, a common task in software development to extend functionality.

job_tasks.phrase: create innovative products that bring cloud-and external platform capabilities into Mendix web applications.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the development of new products by integrating capabilities from external platforms into existing web applications, a software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Working on an Enterprise App development platform
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in the creation and maintenance of a platform for application development, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Diving into all sorts of technologies to integrate our platform with external systems.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of integrating systems using various technologies, a key software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: While our current focus is on Mendix with Java, we also utilize REST APIs, Python, and cloud technologies
job_tasks.justification: This lists specific technologies and integration methods used in software development.

soft_skills.phrase: Closely collaborating with customers and partners
open to adopting any new technology necessary to achieve our goals.
each commit can make a lot of impact.

classification.rationale: This job description focuses heavily on traditional software development and enterprise application development using Java and Mendix. There is no mention of generative AI, LLMs, or related technologies, making it irrelevant to the GenAI Engineer profile.
